title: How many district are in Bihar? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are 38 districts in Bihar divided into 9 divisions. Tirhut (6 districts) West ChamparanEast ChamparanSitamarhiSheoharMuzaffarpurVaishaliSaran (3 districts) SaranSiwanGopalganjPatna (6 districts) RohtasKaimurBuxarBhojpurPatnaNalandaMagadh (5 districts) NawadaJehanabadArwalAurangabadGayaMunger (6 districts) JamuiShiekhpuraLakhisaraiBegusaraiMungerKhagariaBhagalpur (2 districts) BhagalpurBankaPurnia (4 districts) KatiharPurniaKishanganjArariaKosi (3 districts) SaharsaMadhepuraSupaulDarbhanga (3 districts) SamastipurDarbhangaMadhubani

Bihar has 38 districts and 9 divisions. The name of districts are :- Patna Bhojpur Buxar Rohtas Kaimur Nalanda Nawada Gaya Arwal Aurangabad Sitamarhi Jamui Banka Gopalganj Siwan West champaran East champaran Madhepura Jehanabad Supaul Madhubani Saran Mujaffapur Darbhanga Bhagalpur Sheohar Munger Lakhisarai Begusarai Samastipur Vaishali Saharsa Araria Purnia Kathihar Kishanganj Khagaria Sheikhpura.  The divisions are :- Tirhut Saran Patna Bhagalpur Munger Magadh Kosi Darbhanga Purnia.
There are 38 districts in total. You can always check such administrative details on Bihar govt. website- Bihar Govt. Web Site.
